description: This file defines a Zustand store for managing global game state in a horse riding simulator, including metrics like score, speed, stamina, distance, movement inputs, avatar customization, tutorial steps, and associated setter actions.

methods.name: setInput
methods.description: Updates movement input state based on partial input provided.

methods.name: setGait
methods.description: Sets the current gait of the horse, affecting speed and stamina.

methods.name: setAvatar
methods.description: Updates avatar customization options such as horse color, mane color, and rider outfit.

methods.name: addScore
methods.description: Increases the player's score by a specified amount, ensuring it doesn't go below zero.

methods.name: setSpeed
methods.description: Updates the horse's speed, ensuring it is non-negative.

methods.name: addDistance
methods.description: Adds to the total distance traveled, ensuring it's non-negative.

methods.name: nextTutorial
methods.description: Advances the tutorial step to the next one, respecting the maximum index.

methods.name: prevTutorial
methods.description: Goes back to the previous tutorial step, respecting the minimum index.

methods.name: toggleTutorial
methods.description: Activates or deactivates the tutorial display.
